https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Unique ID representing a non-personalized message sent to the end user.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Base Message ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Represents the base Message ID from which the published message is derived.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message Publication ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Message Publication ID. Represents a frozen/published version of message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Channel's variant ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Is not frozen and might remain same between different versions of message publication.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: The channel for which this row corresponds.
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Each specific experience channel defines a constant `@id`.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: The json template used in the message
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The json template used while sending the message

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message Publication Time
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Time at which message was published
